description:
Born with severe birth defects confining her to a hospital since birth, Rico`s parents signed her over to the SWA on her eleventh birthday, where she was given a new lease on life due to her cybernetic operation. Rico loves her new body and life at the SWA, viewing each day as a blessing. She maintains a happy disposition, despite her treatment as a machine by her handler, Jean.
Rico`s preferred weapons are the CZ 75 pistol, Dragunov SVD and Beretta SCP-70/90.
name: Rico
